name: Stuck at hone
description:
In this game you play as So-Surreal, a kid who has to stay at home and do her homework while her family goes for a walk. However, completing your homework might involve more than you bargained for... What starts as a childish, poorly drawn adventure turns into a hellish nightmare.

This game is made for the "I can't draw but I want to make a game" jam 2020, and was made within 2 weeks.
